# quote
Creating a Swift single page App to implement PhraseApp

# Proper System Setup
1. Update to the newest Xcode version if you haven't done already

2. Install Cocoapods with homebrew '$brew install cocoapods'

3. Run 'pod install' in the project folder to get all dependencies installed properply

4. Run the App :)

# Using Phrase and internationalize the App further
> Please not that I initialy created the app with a few languages, however Phrase gives you the oppurtunity to internationalize the application some more.
> I've already setuo the SDK as well as all other necessary steps, you just have to customize it with your on productin secret and id.
[Look up the proper setup for OTA here](https://help.phrase.com/en/articles/2433968-ios-sdk-installation-instructions?%3D)
